name: International Business Chamber
tag_list: international-business-services, start-ups, venture-capital, business-angel, seed-capital, tech-companies
overview:
An American company specialized in providing high quality international services for :

A) American start ups and tech companies, that are expanding their business or entering into new market abroad.

B) Foreign start ups and tech companies expanding their business and entering into the US market.

IBC’s Administrative Division offers a lot of business and administrative services in different languages and IBC’s Call Center Division is a premium business process outsourcing provider specializing in customer relationship management services. IBC’s customer care and technical support services enable fast growing companies to increase revenue generation, operational efficiencies and brand loyalty.

IBC is a global organization with 25 offices in 14 countries and clients around the world. The diverse experiences, perspectives, ideas, and backgrounds of their associates help IBC deliver great service to the clients and more importantly, helps them to be one of the best companies in the industry. IBC is a global organization with 25 offices in 14 countries (5 new openings in 2012) and clients around the world. The diverse experiences, perspectives, ideas, and backgrounds of our associates help us deliver great service to our clients and more importantly, helps us to be one of the best companies in the industry.
